title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Finance) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister finance) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Ms. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited
text_raw:
2. Ms. Deborah Sweeney, particulars of whose address have been deposited 
at the offices of the Department of Finance, Government Buildings, Upper 
Merrion Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Finance with effect from 28 June 2020.
text_norm: 2 m deborah sweeney particular whose address deposited office department finance government building upper merrion street dublin 2 appointed special adviser minister finance effect 28 june 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Mr. Ed Brophy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Mr. Ed Brophy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, Government Buildings, Upper Merrion 
Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Finance 
with effect from 28 June 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [522] 3
